explains: n. 含酒精饮品，酒；酒精，乙醇；醇
wordGroup: ethyl alcohol 乙醇；酒精；威士忌
fatty alcohol 脂肪醇；脂肪族醇；高级醇
methyl alcohol 木精，甲醇（等于methanol）
butyl alcohol 丁醇；酪醇（等于butanol）
fuel alcohol 动力酒精，燃料酒精
alcohol abuse 酒精滥用，酗酒
lauryl alcohol 月桂醇；十二醇

sentences.en: He gave up the crutch of alcohol.
Alcohol acts quickly on the brain.
sentences.cn: 酒精对大脑迅速产生影响。
